movie.title: You'll Never Be Alone
movie.description_intro: First feature film directed by Alex Anwandter. You'll never be alone tells the story of Juan, a withdrawn manager at a mannequin factory who after his teenage gay son suffers a violent attack, struggles between paying his son's exorbitant medical bills and his last attempt at becoming partners with his boss. As he runs into dead-ends and unexpected betrayals, he'll discover the world he knew was already waiting to be violent with him too.
movie.description_full: First feature film directed by Alex Anwandter. movies.title: False Flag
movies.summary: The recounted events of the night that two estranged brothers attempted to reconnect and escape a small town, seemingly taken over by martial law.
movies.description_full: The recounted events of the night that two estranged brothers attempted to reconnect and escape a small town, seemingly taken over by martial law.
movies.synopsis: The recounted events of the night that two estranged brothers attempted to reconnect and escape a small town, seemingly taken over by martial law.

movies.title: Hell Riders
movies.summary: A woman whose car breaks down in the desert and attacked by bikers finds her way to a small town, where the town residents are terrorized by the psycho bikers.
movies.description_full: A woman whose car breaks down in the desert and attacked by bikers finds her way to a small town, where the town residents are terrorized by the psycho bikers.
movies.synopsis: A woman whose car breaks down in the desert and attacked by bikers finds her way to a small town, where the town residents are terrorized by the psycho bikers.

movies.title: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
movies.summary: Based on the runaway bestseller, Where'd You Go, Bernadette is an inspiring comedy about Bernadette Fox "Academy Award winner Cate Blanchett", a loving mom who becomes compelled to reconnect with her creative passions after years of sacrificing herself for her family. Bernadette's leap of faith takes her on an epic adventure that jump-starts her life and leads to her triumphant rediscovery.

Bernadette's leap of faith takes her on an epic adventure that jump-starts her life and leads to her triumphant rediscovery.

movies.title: Solo Sunny
movies.summary: Sunny is the singer of band trying to establish itself in the music-scene of East-Berlin. They play regular gigs in small towns, but Sunny feels out of touch with the audience and her life as a whole. She begins a relationship with the amateur saxophonist and studied philosopher Ralph who writes her a very personal song - but his obsession with death and unfaithful lifestyle is not for her. After getting into a quarrel with a band member who harasses her and telling off a show-host she is thrown out of the band. Abandoned, she struggles to regain control over her life.
